type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

payment-terms.IDIssuer: Issuer of payment terms codes - e.g. UNECE
payment-terms.ID: Payment Terms code - e.g. UNECE Recommendation 17 Code List
payment-terms.AmountPayable: Invoice payable amount at the due date
payment-terms.DiscountDueDate: Invoice payment earlier due date to qualify for the payment discount
payment-terms.DiscountPercent: Invoice payment discount % if paid at the discount due date or earlier
payment-terms.DiscountAmount: Invoice payment discount amount if paid at the discount due date or earlier
